subject: Unit testing practices questionnaire
msgSnippet: I am a student at Delft University of Technology  and I am performing a research project on the quality and (co-)evolution of unit tests. For this project I am
messageBody:
I am a student at Delft University of Technology and I am performing a
research project on the quality and (co-)evolution of unit tests. For
this project I am conducting a survey on unit testing practices. This
survey is done through an online questionnaire. Questions to be answered
with this survey are how and why (or not) developers use unit tests.

To collect responses to this questionnaire I ask developers and project
leaders to consider participating in the survey. I am looking for users
of xUnit frameworks who are involved in the process of testing, from
both industrial and open-source projects. The questionnaire will take
about 10 minutes of your time.

The questionnaire can be found through the following link.

http://www.sig.eu/en/questionnaire.html
<http://www.sig.eu/en/questionnaire.html>

More information on the research project is described in the latest
newsletter
<http://www.sig.nl/images/stories/sig_newletter_may%202008.pdf>  of
the company where I perform my internship (Software Improvement
Group, http://www.sig.eu/ <http://www.sig.eu> ), and on the university's
research group website <http://swerl.tudelft.nl>

Thank you for your participation.

Regards,

Zeeger Lubsen



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
